body.title: Console
body.elms:
$ psql #logs in to default database & default user
    $ sudo -u <rolename:postgres> psql #logs in with a particular user

body.title: Commands
body.elms:
* Show roles: `\du`
 * Show tables: `\dt`
 * Show databases: `\l`
 * Connect to a database: `\c <database>`
 * Show columns of a table: `\d <table>` or `\d+ <table>`
 * Quit: `\q`
